about.title: About me
about.primary: I am a computer science student interested in the newest technologies shaking the world with a particular interest in statistics and machine learning!
about.secondary: I have completed a full-stack internship @ NSI and am seeking Summer 2024 internship opportunities!

projects.title: EY 2024 Wildfire Prediction Winner
projects.description: I placed 2/121 teams in a wildfire prediction challenge in the annual UWaterloo Data Science competition. My first such project, I learned a lot about data engineering, visualizations, and machine learning.

projects.title: Text Editor
projects.description: Vim is my favourite text editor, so when we had the choice to recreate it for the CS246E (Enriched OOP) final project, I was estatic! Using C++ and NCurses, this project was difficult but immensely rewarding as I learned a ton about low-level programming, code architecture, and design patterns!

projects.title: Chess
projects.description: My friend Amaan and I love playing Chess; we decided to make it ourselves and learned a lot, from frontend styling, to chess logic with an AI agent (that was interesting!), and backend endpoints to put it all together, we had a blast!

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
